observation: I see a residence selection page with a dropdown showing 'Select' and a country/region field. There are also language selection modals open on the left and right sides of the screen. I need to close these language modals first and then proceed with the residence selection to continue the sign-up flow.
reasoning: As a normal user, I would first close the distracting language selection modals that are overlaying the main content. The close button (×) at element 31 appears to be for closing one of these modals.
ux_issues: Multiple language selection modals are overlapping the main content
The interface shows duplicate language selection options

outcome.visual_observation: The colorful visual debugging overlays (dashed border boxes in various colors - orange, green, cyan, magenta) that were present around UI elements in the BEFORE screenshot have been removed in the AFTER screenshot. The page layout and content remain identical otherwise.
